messages.subject: [NHEN-SpeakOut] Homeschooling in the News 4/28/01
messages.msgSnippet: April 27 Arizona Republic : Suit asks services for 2 blind home-taught kidshttp://www.azcentral.com:80/news/0427schoolsuit27.html A Scottsdale couple is suing
messages.messageBody:
April 27
Arizona Republic : Suit asks services for 2 blind home-taught
kidshttp://www.azcentral.com:80/news/0427schoolsuit27.html
A Scottsdale couple is suing the Scottsdale Unified School District for
refusing to provide special education services to their two home-schooled
blind children.

Kansas City Star : Midwest home-schoolers gather in Olathe
http://www.kcstar.com:80/item/pages/printer.pat,local/3acca14e.427,.html
Article about a Christian homeschooling conference.

Cleveland Plain Dealer : Judge rejects estranged sister's claim of assault
http://www.cleveland.com/news/plaindealer/index.ssf?/xml/story.ssf/html_standa

rd.xsl?/base/summit/9883638061999846.xml
Two daughters of Thomas Lavery, a homeschooling father accused of abuse, go
to court over one sister's alleged assault of the other.

Minor mentions:

April 28
Virginian Pilot : Mark Warner promises teachers more money
http://www.pilotonline.com/news/nw0428gov.html

New York Times : Iquitos Journal: Simple, Devoted Lives on the Amazon
http://www.nytimes.com/2001/04/28/world/28PERU.html

Lincoln Journal Star: Four honored for helping women
http://www.journalstar.com:80/local?story_id=3414&date=20010428&past=

Zap2it : Patinkin to Play 'Public' Dad
http://tv.zap2it.com/news/tvnewsdaily.html?17483
The May 21 episode of Chicago Hope will feature Patinkin as the dad of a
homeschooled boy.

Tri-City Herald : Keeping CBC on course
http://www.tri-cityherald.com/news/2001/0428/story4.html

Orange County Register : Immobilized mobile home park
http://www.ocregister.com/local/mobilehome0428cci.shtml

April 27
AZCentral : Big kids tell little: Science is cool
http://www.azcentral.com:80/community/comstories/0427science0427Z4.html

Amarillo Globe-News : Religion: Amarilloan creates radio show
http://www.amarillonet.com/stories/042701/rel_radio.shtml

(Colorado) State science and engineering fair winners announced
http://search.newschoice.com/GPC_StoryDisplay.asp?story=d:\index\newsarchives\

dnvpstv\fpg\20010426\822100_ftp0105.txt&searchtext=home-school


Laura Derrick
National Home Education Network
